channel.title: Sky Studios on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Sky Studios on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Will Sharpe Is Mozart and Paul Bettany an Envious Court Composer in First Look at Sky’s ‘Amadeus’
item.description: The Sky Original, coming later this year, follows Sharpe (‘The White Lotus,’ ‘Too Much’) as the famed musical prodigy, Wolfgang ‘Amadeus’ Mozart.

item.title: Will Sharpe Is Mozart and Paul Bettany an Envious Court Composer in First Look at Sky’s ‘Amadeus’
